item.title: THANK YOU FOR CHOOSING EKC. WE ARE CURRENTLY RUNNING A RAFFLE FOR THE NEW FIRETV / $5 PER RAFFLE TICKET / TO BUY TICKETS GO TO www.elitekustomconfig.com AND CLICK ON SHOP / FOR SUPPORT LIKE FACEBOOK.COM/ELITEKUSTOMCONFIG- CONTACT AT ELITEKUSTOMCONFIG@GMAIL.COM -
